Verses: 1 isravelar Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Irandaam Varusham Irandaam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyil, Karththar Seenaai Vanaandharaththilirukkira Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Moseyai Nokki:
2 neengal Isravel Puththirarin Muzhuchchabaiyaayirukkira Avargal Pidhaakkaludaiya Veettu Vamsangalilulla Purushargalaagiya Sagala Thalaigalaiyum Perperaaga Ennith Thogaiyetrungal.
3 isravelile Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththukkup Purappadaththakkavargal Ellaaraiyum Avargal Senaigalinpadi Neeyum Aaronum Ennip Paarppeergalaaga.
4 ovvoru Koththiraththukku Ovvoru Manidhan Ungalode Iruppaanaaga; Avan Than Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththukkuth Thalaivanaayirukkavendum.
5 ungalode Nirkavendiya Manidharudaiya Naamangalaavana: Rooban Koththiraththil Sedheyoorudaiya Kumaaran Elisoor.
6 simiyon Koththiraththil Soorishadhaayin Kumaaran Seloomiyel.
7 yoodhaa Koththiraththil Amminadhaapin Kumaaran Nakason.
8 isakkaar Koththiraththil Soovaarin Kumaaran Nedhaneyel.
9 sepulon Koththiraththil Elonin Kumaaran Eliyaap.
10 yoseppin Kumaararaagiya Eppraayeem Koththiraththil Ammiyoodhin Kumaaran Elishaamaa; Manaase Koththiraththil Pedhaasoorin Kumaaran Kamaaliyel.
11 benyameen Koththiraththil Keedheyonin Kumaaran Apeedhaan.
12 thaan Koththiraththil Ammishadhaayin Kumaaran Akiyeser.
13 aaser Koththiraththil Okiraanin Kumaaran Paakiyel.
14 kaadh Koththiraththil Thekuvelin Kumaaran Eliyaasaap.
15 napthali Koththiraththil Enaanin Kumaaran Akeeraa.
16 ivargale Sabaiyil Erpaduththappattavargalum, Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Koththirangalil Prabukkalum, Isravelil Aayiravargalukkuth Thalaivarumaayiruppavargal Endraar.
17 appadiye Moseyum Aaronum Perperaagak Kurikkappatta Indha Manidharaik Koottikkondu,

18 irandaam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyil Sabaiyaar Ellaaraiyum Koodivarachcheydhaargal. Appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Thangal Kudumbaththinpadikkum, Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththinpadikkum, Naamaththogaiyinpadikkum, Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Thalaithalaiyaagath Thangal Vamsa Urpaththiyaith Theriviththaargal.
19 ippadik Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye, Mose Avargalai Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Ennippaarththaan.

20 isravelin Mooththakumaaranaagiya Rooban Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettuvamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargalmudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Thalaithalaiyaaga Ennappattapodhu,
21 rooban Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Naarpaththaaraayiraththu Ainnooruper.
22 simiyon Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Thalaithalaiyaaga Ennappattapodhu,
23 simiyon Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Aimbaththonbadhinaayiraththu Munnooruper.
24 kaadh Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaararil Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
25 kaadh Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Naarpaththaiyaayiraththu Arunootru Aimbadhuper.
26 yoodhaa Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
27 yoodhaa Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Ezhubaththu Naalaayiraththu Arunooruper.
28 isakkaar Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
29 isakkaar Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Aimbaththu Naalaayiraththu Naanooruper.
30 sepulon Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
31 sepulon Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Aimbaththezhaayiraththu Naanooruper.
32 yoseppin Kumaararil Eppraayeem Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
33 eppraayeem Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Naarpadhinaayiraththu Ainnooruper.
34 manaase Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
35 manaase Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Muppaththeeraayiraththu Irunooruper.
36 benyameen Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
37 benyameen Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Muppaththaiyaayiraththu Naanooruper.
38 thaan Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
39 thaan Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Arubaththeeraayiraththu Ezhunooruper.
40 aaser Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
41 aaser Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Naarpaththoraayiraththu Ainnooruper.
42 napthali Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsaththaaril Irubadhu Vayadhullavargal Mudhal Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakka Purushargal Ellaarum Ennappattapodhu,
43 napthali Koththiraththil Ennappattavargal, Aimbaththu Moovaayiraththu Naanooruper.
44 ennappattavargal Ivargale; Moseyum Aaronum Israveludaiya Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththil Ovvoru Vamsaththukku Ovvoru Prabuvaagiya Panniranduperum Enninaargal.
45 isravel Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththil Irubadhu Vayadhullavargalmudhal, Isravelil Yuththaththirkup Purappadaththakkavargalaagiya Ennappatta Pergal Ellaarum,
46 aarulatchaththu Moovaayiraththu Ainnootru Aimbadhu Peraayirundhaargal.
47 leviyar Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Koththiraththinpadiye, Matravargaludane Ennappadavillai.
48 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
49 nee Levi Koththiraththaaraimaaththiram Ennaamalum, Isravel Puththirarukkulle Avargal Thogaiyai Etraamalum,

50 leviyarai Saatchiyin Vaasasthalaththirkum, Adhinudaiya Sagala Panimuttugalukkum, Adhilulla Samastha Porulgalukkum Visaarippukkaararaaga Erpaduththu; Avargal Vaasasthalaththaiyum Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Sumappaargalaaga; Adhinidaththil Oozhiyamseydhu, Vaasasthalaththai Sutrilum Paalayamirangakkadavargal.

51 vaasasthalam Purappadumpodhu, Leviyar Adhai Irakkivaiththu, Adhu Sthaabanam Pannappadumpodhu, Leviyar Adhai Eduththu Niruththakkadavargal; Anniyan Adharku Sameebaththil Vandhaal Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
52 isravel Puththirar Thangal Thangal Paalayaththodum, Thangal Thangal Senaiyin Kodiyodum Koodaaram Podakkadavargal.
53 isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyinmel Kadunkobam Varaadhapadikku Leviyar Saatchiyin Vaasasthalaththai Sutrilum Paalayamirangi, Leviyar Saatchiyin Vaasasthalaththaik Kaavalkaappaargalaaga Endraar.
54 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadi Ellaavatraiyum Isravel Puththirar Seydhaargal.
